Brakeza3D **0.26.2** is now available! üöÄ  
This release focuses on editor usability, shader workflow improvements, scripting enhancements, and major internal cleanup.

Download for **Linux** and **Windows**:  
- https://github.com/rzeronte/brakeza3d/releases/tag/0.26.2
- https://brakeza.com/downloads

<!-- truncate -->

## ‚ú® What‚Äôs New

### Rendering & Shaders
- Multiple `Mesh3DShaderChain` fixes
- Improved Shader Node Editor processing
- New internal texture nodes

### Editor & UX
- Native toolbar with updated icons and colors
- Script/shader editor improvements
- Documented shortcuts + ‚ÄúClose all tabs‚Äù button
- Custom project tree widgets

### Assets & Projects
- Massive cleanup of scenes and demos
- Sound asset integration
- Unified file browser (scenes, scripts, projects)
- Improved project setup and editable metadata

### Scripting & Lua
- Bullet functions exposed to Lua
- Better ComponentScripting workflow
- New tutorials and expanded example scripts
- Script-controlled sound volume
- New `Clean()` function for selective cleanup

### Docs & Maintenance
- Continuous documentation updates
- Linux CMake fixes
- Memory management improvements
- ImGui style balancing
- Extensive `.gitignore` cleanup

---

This release brings a cleaner foundation and a smoother workflow across the engine and editor.

Thanks to everyone testing Brakeza3D and providing feedback ‚ù§Ô∏è

## Assets Hub Alpha Released üöÄ

We‚Äôre excited to announce the **alpha release of Assets Hub**, a new platform designed to expand and strengthen the Brakeza3D ecosystem.

Assets Hub is an integrated portal where the community can **share, discover, and reuse scripts and shaders** created by other Brakeza3D users. The main goal is to encourage collaboration, learning, and faster development through high-quality community-driven resources.

![Assets Hub](/img/hub/01.png)

<!-- truncate -->

## Deep Integration with Brakeza3D

Assets Hub is **directly integrated into the Brakeza3D engine**. The engine now includes a built-in client that allows users to:

- Log in to their Assets Hub account
- Browse community-created assets
- Vote and rate resources
- Download scripts and shaders created by third parties

All of this happens without leaving the engine, keeping the workflow fast and seamless.

## Web Portal for Asset Management

Assets Hub is also available as a **web platform** at:

https://hub.brakeza.com/

From the web interface, creators can **upload, update, and manage their assets**, making it easy to maintain and showcase their contributions to the community.

## Alpha Status

Assets Hub is currently in **alpha**, which means it is still under active development. Features, workflows, and APIs may change in the coming weeks as we iterate based on feedback.

This early stage is a great opportunity for the community to test the platform and help shape its future.

## Free and Ad-Free

Assets Hub is a **free service**, with **no advertisements** and no hidden costs. It is built to support the Brakeza3D community and promote open sharing and collaboration.

---
